About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a developer who searches for the extraordinary moments in life and believe these experiences are only as powerful as the ability to process it. I accredit the majority of my success to a love of people, a positive outlook on life, and a passion for building professional bridges.I am confident in my ability to perform at high levels and deliver superior results. I have a record of success in working independently and on a team. I have excellent communication and interpersonal skills with an ability to prioritize and handle multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment, building creative and simple solutions, interactive web applications with a focus on functionality and testability.

Thinkful

Apprentice Full Stack Developer

Learned industry best practices and practical software development standards with a focus on HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Redux, and data structures & algorithms.Created and deployed mobile-first applications while learning new languages and frameworks through several hours of weekly collaboration with fellow apprentices and senior web developers.

Skill Set

Front End

HTML5 CSS3 JS jQuery ES6 React

Backend

RESTful APIs Node.js Express MongoDB Postgres Mongoose Knex
